articles.author: Michael  Loftus
articles.title: Indiana woman says tea laced with pills given to ex-fiancé was a chemistry experiment - CBS News
articles.description: Esther Jane Stephen, a high school softball coach, was arrested in 2020 in the fatal shooting of her former fiancé Shea Briar in Jay County, Indiana. Prosecutors say Stephen, known as E.J., had attempted to kill him before with a drink laced with ibuprofen.
articles.content:
It was in the early morning hours of Jan. 12, 2020, when 31-year-old Shea Briar was found clinging to life on a rural road in Jay County, Indiana. 
Briar was unable to communicate, and first respond… [+3467 chars]
